skins.shipDescription: North Carolina class battleship¡ª North Carolina, hull number BB-55.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am North Carolina class ship no.1. I can be considered the big sister battleship of the Eagle Union~ I don¡¯t particularly like or dislike anything, so to speak. Even though I have fought in all kinds of engagements, I have not gained any fame... I am a little bit troubled by this.
skins.acquisition: North Carolina here, awaiting your dispatch. Although I may seem to have a bland personality compared to my sisters. But as the saying goes, no personality is still a personality, hehe. Anyways, awaiting your orders, sir.
skins.details: Being stared like that makes a bit shy...
skins.secretaryIdle1: What do I wear inside? It's not something that¡¯s so significant
skins.secretaryIdle2: If I think about it, I certainly have been to many places... seen many landscapes, and also parted ways with many people.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Sometimes I get so envious of my younger sister Washington and how she¡¯s so energetic all the time.
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you need help with something?
